text: Onon, ki imon ovardaand va muhocirat kardaand va ʙo molu coni xes dar rohi Xudo cihod kardaand va onon, ki ʙa muhociron coj doda va joriason kardaand, joru dusti jakdigarand. Va onon, ki imon ovardaand, va muhocirat nakardaand, joru dusti sumo nestand, to on goh ki muhocirat kunand. Vale agar sumoro ʙa jori talaʙidand, ʙojad ʙa joriason ʙarxezed. ƣajri on, ki ʙar ziddi on guruhe ʙosad, ki mijoni sumo va onho pajmone ʙasta suda ʙosad. Va Xudo ʙa korhoe, ki mekuned, ʙinost
